data.text: @enews Don't you dare taking about Pillowtalk like that!
@enews Hi, I am an expert graphic designer. I can design #BusinessCards #logo #Flyers #brochure etc. If you need, knock me on fiverr. https://t.co/hWCGjH13n1

@enews I’d give anything to be that girl & have the opportunity to just breathe in the smell of Zayn. He’s such a beautiful creature. I might be married but I let it be known if I had the chance, Zayn is my hall pass! My husband is ok with my lust for Zayn lol.
